title: The life cycle of a viral product
excerpt: The video app is causing products to blow up — and flame out — faster than ever.

title: How TikTok Chooses Which Songs Go Viral
excerpt: When Megan Thee Stallion took off her bright orange mask and walked onstage to accept her Grammy on March 14, she fought back tears and thanked God, her mother, and her managers for helping her become the first female rapper to win the award for best new artist in two decades.

title: How brands are using TikTok as a channel for customer service and product f
excerpt: Brands have unsolicited feedback in their TikTok comments, allowing them to answer customer questions, see trends, and make product changes.

title: 11 TikTok Video Ideas for Merchants
excerpt: You’ve downloaded TikTok and browsed the videos. Now you’re wondering what content to create for your ecommerce business. There are many types of videos to attract leads without dancing on camera. Here are 11 ideas for all types of merchants.
